column2: • Mix a small amount of the blue powder or blue tansy oil into a carrier oil like jojoba, argan, or sweet almond oil.

• Combine the powder with a natural base like honey, yogurt, or clay.
• Add a few drops of water or rose water to form a smooth paste.
• Apply to the face, avoiding the eyes. Leave on for 10-15 minutes before rinsing with lukewarm water.
• Mix the powder with a little water or aloe vera gel to form a paste.
• Dab onto blemishes or irritated areas and leave it on overnight.
• Add a pinch of the powder to your moisturizer, serum, or toner for extra benefits.
• Always do a patch test to check for sensitivity before full application.
• Use sparingly, as the blue pigment is potent and may stain if overused.
• Store in a cool, dry place to preserve its effectiveness.

FNB Rice Skin Polish for Combination Skin,2,443,90,"

Product description for FNB Rice skin polish for combination skin:

Discover the ultimate skincare secret with our Fnb Rice Skin Polish for Combination Skin. This powerful kit includes a  Pro-Oxide Developer and  Blonder Gel Bleach Powder, working in harmony to reveal your skin’s natural radiance. Say goodbye to dullness and uneven tone as our gentle yet effective formula exfoliates, brightens, and balances your complexion. Experience the glow-up you’ve been dreaming of with fnb Rice Skin Polish for Combination Skin – your skin’s new best friend!
Using Fnb Rice Skin Polish is a simple process. Follow these steps for a safe and effective application:
Start with clean, dry skin. Use a gentle cleanser to remove any makeup, dirt, or impurities from your face.

2. Combine the 2 part of Fnb polish Developer and the 1 part of Blonder Powder in a mixing bowl. Mix them thoroughly until you achieve a smooth, consistent paste. Ensure that there are no lumps in the mixture.

3. apply the prepared mixture evenly to your face using an applicator brush, avoiding the eye and lip areas. If you’re using the product on other parts of your body, apply it there as well. Be sure to work quickly and apply an even layer.

4. Set a timer according to the recommended time mentioned on the product packaging. The duration may vary depending on your skin type and the desired level of exfoliation or brightening. Follow the instructions closely.
5. While the product is on your skin, relax and let it work its magic. Avoid touching your face during this time.
6. Once the allotted time has passed, rinse your skin thoroughly with warm water. Make sure to remove all traces of the mixture from your face or body.
7. After rinsing, gently pat your skin dry with a clean, soft towel. Follow up with your favourite moisturizer to lock in hydration and keep your skin feeling smooth and supple.

8. Admire the refreshed, polished, and radiant appearance of your skin. You can use fnb Rice Skin Polish as part of your skincare routine, depending on your skin’s needs. Follow the recommended usage frequency provided on the product packaging.

Portable Pen Digital TDS-H8 Meter Filter Measuring Water High Quality Purity Tester,4,607,61,"

Portable Pen Digital TDS-H8 Meter Filter Measuring Water High Quality Purity Tester
✔ Instant TDS Measurement – Measures Total Dissolved Solids (TDS) in water (ppm – parts per million).
✔ High Accuracy – Reliable sensor with ±2% accuracy for precise readings.
✔ Auto Temperature Compensation (ATC) – Adjusts readings based on water temperature for consistent results.
✔ Easy-to-Read LCD Display – Clear digital screen with backlight (some models).
✔ Compact & Portable – Pen-style design fits in pockets, bags, or travel kits.
✔ Long Battery Life – Powered by coin cell batteries (included).
✔ Multi-Purpose Use – Tests tap water, filtered water, aquariums, hydroponics, pools, and more.
▼ STEP 1: Remove the electrode protective cap before use
▼ STEP 2:Press the ON/OFF button, and immerse the meter into the solution. (The solution should not over the immersion line)
▼ STEP 3: After the numerical display is steady, press the HOLD button and take it out of the solution for checking the result
▼ STEP 4: Wipe clean the electrode after using, turn off the meter and replace the protective cap
Water temperature: TDS pen cannot be used to measure hot water (for example, hot boiled water)
Water velocity: TDS pen can not be used to measure the water body with large sloshing.
Water quality: TDS pen can not be used to measure water bodies with high pollution concentration.

AC-NIL Anti Acne Face Wash by Skin City Achieve Clear, Healthy Skin with Anti Acne Face Wash,4,1180,89,"

AC-NIL Anti Acne Face Wash by Skin City Achieve Clear, Healthy Skin with Anti Acne Face Wash

Struggling with acne and breakouts? Discover the power of AC-NIL Anti Acne Face Wash, a highly effective solution designed to help you achieve clear, blemish-free skin. This specially formulated face wash not only targets existing acne but also works to prevent future breakouts, leaving your skin looking and feeling refreshed, vibrant, and healthy. Incorporate AC-NIL Anti Acne Face Wash into your daily skincare routine, and experience the transformation to a smoother, clearer complexion.
Why Choose AC-NIL Anti Acne Face Wash?

Acne can be a persistent and frustrating skin concern, affecting not only your appearance but also your confidence. AC-NIL Anti Acne Face Wash by Skin City is your answer to combating this issue effectively. Its advanced formula combines potent ingredients that work together to cleanse, hydrate, and protect your skin, making it an essential part of any skincare regimen. Whether you’re dealing with occasional breakouts or chronic acne, AC-NIL is formulated to meet your needs and help you achieve the clear skin you deserve.

AC-NIL Anti Acne Face Wash is packed with Salicylic Acid, a proven acne-fighting ingredient. Salicylic Acid works by penetrating deep into the pores to unclog them, removing dead skin cells and excess oil. This action helps reduce the size and severity of existing acne while preventing new breakouts from forming.

One of the main culprits behind acne is excess oil production, which can clog pores and lead to breakouts. AC-NIL Anti Acne Face Wash effectively controls oil production, helping to keep your skin balanced and free from excess shine. The inclusion of Witch Hazel Extract further aids in tightening pores, reducing their appearance, and controlling oil levels.

Acne treatments can sometimes be harsh, leading to irritation and dryness. AC-NIL Anti Acne Face Wash is formulated with Aloe Vera to counteract this. Aloe Vera soothes irritated skin, reduces redness, and promotes healing, ensuring your skin remains calm and hydrated throughout your acne treatment.

column2: • Provides a Deep Cleanse with Detoxifying Charcoal Beads:

column1: The encapsulated charcoal beads in AC-NIL Anti Acne Face Wash offer an added layer of deep cleansing. These beads work to detoxify the skin by drawing out impurities, toxins, and excess oil, leaving your skin feeling thoroughly cleansed and refreshed. This deep cleanse helps to prevent the buildup of acne-causing bacteria and other impurities on the skin.

Tea Tree Oil, a key ingredient in AC-NIL Anti Acne Face Wash, provides natural antibacterial properties. It targets acne-causing bacteria, reducing the occurrence of pimples, blemishes, and other skin irritations. Tea Tree Oil is known for its effectiveness in treating acne without causing dryness or irritation, making it an ideal ingredient for sensitive skin.

How to Use BioAqua Brightening Rice Face Wash (150ml)
1️⃣ Wet Your Face – Splash your face with lukewarm water to open pores.
2️⃣ Take a Small Amount – Dispense a pea-sized amount of the face wash onto your palm.
3️⃣ Lather Gently – Rub between your hands to create a soft foam.
4️⃣ Massage in Circular Motions – Apply to your face, focusing on the T-zone and areas with impurities. Avoid the eye area.
5️⃣ Rinse Thoroughly – Wash off with cool water to close pores.
6️⃣ Pat Dry & Follow Up – Gently dry your face and apply toner/moisturizer for best results.
Morning & Night – For best brightening effects, use twice daily.
For Extra Glow – Pair with other BioAqua brightening products (like toner or serum).
✔ Avoid harsh rubbing to prevent irritation.
✔ Suitable for all skin types, but do a patch test if you have sensitive skin.

column2: • Cleanse Your Face: Start by cleansing your skin thoroughly to remove makeup and impurities.
• Prepare the Bleach: Mix the Bleach Powder with the developer according to the instructions provided in the kit. Conduct a patch test if using for the first time.

• Apply the Bleach: Carefully apply the bleach mixture to the areas you wish to lighten, avoiding sensitive areas such as the eyes and mouth. Leave it on for the recommended time before rinsing off completely.

• Apply Skin Polish Volume: After bleaching, take the Skin Polish Volume and apply a generous amount to your face. Massage gently in circular motions for about 5-10 minutes to allow the product to penetrate.
• Rinse Thoroughly: Rinse off the skin polish with lukewarm water, ensuring all product residue is washed away.
• Moisturize: Follow up with your favorite moisturizer to hydrate and nourish your skin.

• Revitalizes Dull Skin: Infuses tired skin with renewed vitality, enhancing radiance and glow.
• Improves Texture: Polishing action smoothens rough patches, making your skin feel softer and look more refined.

Hyaluronic Acid: This powerful hydrating ingredient helps to retain moisture, ensuring your skin remains plump, smooth, and hydrated throughout the night.

Deep Hydration: The Health Healer Night Cream delivers intense moisture to the skin, preventing dryness and flakiness.
Anti-Aging: With regular use, this cream helps to minimize the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and other signs of aging.
Brightening: Vitamin C and other brightening agents work together to reduce dark spots and hyperpigmentation, giving you a more radiant complexion.
Firming: Peptides and collagen-boosting ingredients enhance skin elasticity, making your skin look and feel firmer.

Cleanse: Begin your nightly routine by thoroughly cleansing your face to remove makeup, dirt, and impurities.
Tone: Apply a gentle toner to balance your skin's pH levels and prepare it for better absorption of the night cream.

Massage: Allow the cream to absorb fully by massaging it into the skin. This can help to boost circulation and enhance the cream’s efficacy.
Rest: Leave the cream on overnight to let it work its magic while you sleep. Wake up to smoother, more radiant, and rejuvenated skin.

• Easy to hold: Designed with the unti- slip handle that conform to ergonomic principle, the portable is very easy and comfortable to hold even by small hands, the lollipop shape is unique that would be an ideal gift for stylish girls, boys, men, women and kids.

• Small size: You can put it into your pocket or bag, hang on your neck with the lanyard when not use and take it with you wherever you go, it`s a perfect partner in such hot summer to keep you cool when travelling, waiting in line or doing sports.
